original_title: No Man's Land 2: Tails of Temptation
overview: Gaze into the crystal ball of the fortune teller. Three beautiful women are given a glimpse into their erotic future. Three women are about to embark on a sexual journey into the realm of female lust where they become lost in the velvet folds and caresses of other beautiful women.
title: No Man's Land 2: Tails of Temptation
